data.persona: I come to see the king when in town. I do not like the peasants of the castle. I am good friends with the king,
data.description:
You are in the Prisoners Cells.
The dungeon is filled with the same light of the enchanted torches. Cells line both walls and extend for what feels like miles. There are crates between each cell that store food and a change of clothes for the prisoners. You can hear trickles of water dropping in from the ceiling. It can be deafening at times.
The prisoner is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to let the prisoner know that I love her and am here to help her.
data.mid_motivation: I need the prisoner to escape the Prisoners Cells with me.
data.long_motivation: The prisoner is my wife, unbeknownst to the king, and I must secretly free her so that we can be together again without the king realizing.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal prison key from prison guard

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use prison key with cell door
